channel.title: salinity stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in salinity stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: BAD1;OsBADH1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g39020 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0464200 Gene Symbol: BAD1 OsBADH1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BnHO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnHO1 Gene Name: heme oxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnHO1, a haem oxygenase-1 gene from Brassica napus, is required for salinity and osmotic stress-induced lateral root formation.

item.title: CaFIRF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g30250 Gene Symbol: CaFIRF1 Gene Name: FAF1 Interacting RING Finger protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A pepper RING-finger E3 ligase, CaFIRF1, negatively regulates the high-salt stress response by modulating the stability of CaFAF1.

item.title: CaSAP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA10g19590 Gene Symbol: CaSAP14 Gene Name: Pepper stress-associated protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper stress-associated protein 14 (CaSAP14) is a substrate of CaSnRK2.

item.title: CmDOF18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmDOF18 Gene Name: DOF TF 18 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmDOF18 positively regulates salinity tolerance in Chrysanthemum morifolium by activating the oxidoreductase system.

item.title: CmHSFA4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHSFA4 Gene Name: heat-shock factor A4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum CmHSFA4 gene positively regulates salt stress tolerance in transgenic chrysanthemum.

item.title: CrNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase1 Genome: Species: Citrus reshni Functional Descriptions: Molecular cloning and characterization of CrNCED1, a gene encoding 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase in Citrus reshni, with functions in tolerance to multiple abiotic stresses.

item.title: CsAKT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G029650 Gene Symbol: CsAKT1 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAKT1 is a key gene for the CeO2 nanoparticle’s improved cucumber salt tolerance: a validation from CRISPR-Cas9 lines.

item.title: DcHSP17.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcHSP17.7 Gene Name: heat shock protein17 Genome: P27396 Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: DcHSP17.

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GhDsPTP3aA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A06G0600 Gene Symbol: GhDsPTP3aA Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhDsPTP3aD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0680 Gene Symbol: GhDsPTP3aD Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: GmARF16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g181900 Gene Symbol: GmARF16 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Identified and characterized a miR160a–GmARF16–GmMYC2 module and its regulation during the salt–stress response in soybean.

item.title: GmDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmDREB1 Gene Name: dehydration responsive element binding protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmDREB1 improves salt tolerance in transgenic wheat and leaf protein response to high salinity.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmGPDH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmGPDH12 Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmGPDH12, a mitochondrial FAD-GPDH from soybean, increases salt and osmotic stress resistance by modulating redox state and respiration.

item.title: GmPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G242900 Gene Symbol: GmPUB21 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We conclude that GmPUB21 and GmDi19-5 collaborate to regulate drought and salinity tolerance via an ABA-dependent pathway.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g10110 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0197700 Gene Symbol: Gn1a OsCKX2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g07740 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0174500 Gene Symbol: Hd5 DTH8 Ghd8 OsHAP3H LHD1 EF8 CAR8 OsNF-YB11 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.title: JAmyb;OsJAmyb
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g45740 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0684000 Gene Symbol: JAmyb OsJAmyb OsMYB21 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MdNAT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000304285 Gene Symbol: MdNAT7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdNAT7 is responsive to salt and might encode a xanthine and uric acid transporter.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MtNAC969
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAC969 Gene Name: NAC969 transcription factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of one of these transcription factors, MtNAC969, induced formation of a shorter and less-branched root system, whereas RNAi-mediated MtNAC969 inactivation promoted lateral root formation.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g33910 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0436700 Gene Symbol: ONAC063 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: ORF355
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ORF355 Gene Name: ORF355 Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: ORF355 confers enhanced salinity stress adaptability to S-type cytoplasmic male sterility maize by modulating the mitochondrial metabolic homeostasis.

item.title: PtCBL10A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G035400.1 Gene Symbol: PtCBL10A Gene Name: calcineurin B-like protein10 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Poplar calcineurin B-like proteins PtCBL10A and PtCBL10B regulate shoot salt tolerance through interaction with PtSOS2 in the vacuolar membrane.

item.title: RLPK4-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G111760.1 Gene Symbol: RLPK4-1 Gene Name: Receptor-like protein kinase 4 Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Two Receptor-like kinase 4 (RLPK4) v1 or Receptor-like kinase (RLK) v3 could be the candidates for enhanced germination under salinity stress because of their upregulated expression in salt-tolerant variety CM72.

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.
